item.title: Patagonia Hiking
item.description: Katie and I had a wonderful 17-day (!!) trip in Patagonia, as a post-PhD defense celebration for her, and a pre-PhD defense celebration for me. I’ll spare myself writing too many words here, other than to point to the two videos I put together capturing some of the moments from our two main destinations:
